```{python}
from dashboard_utils import *
import datetime 

# Get today's date and time
now = get_current_time()

ticker = "NVDA"
```
# `{python} ticker`

## Row {height="25%"}

### Column
```{python}
#| content: valuebox
#| title: Day of the Week
dict(
    color = "success",
    value = now.strftime("%A")
)
```
### Column
```{python}
#| content: valuebox
#| title: Month
dict(
    color="info",
    value=now.strftime("%B")
)
```
### Column
```{python}
#| content: valuebox
#| title: Year
dict(
    color="lightseagreen",
    value=now.year
)
```
### Column
```{python}
#| content: valuebox
#| title: Week Number
dict(
    color="info",
    value=now.strftime("%W")
)
```
### Column {width="40%"}

```{python}
#| content: valuebox
#| title: non-farm payrolls
dict(
    color="warning",
    value=check_nfp_release()
)
```

## Row 


```{python}
#| title: Strategy History
stock_data = prepare_data_and_indicators(ticker=ticker)
plot_candlestick_with_indicators(data=stock_data, title=f'Stock Chart of {ticker}', width=1400, height=800)
```
